site_name: LAND ON THE CORNER OF BRIANT AND, BESSON STREET, LONDON, SE14 5AE
description: An application submitted under Section 96a of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a non-material amendment in connection with the planning permission (DC/19/114805) dated 28 January 2025:- in order to vary the wording of the consented description to: The comprehensive redevelopment of Land at the corner of Briant and Besson Street, SE14, including demolition of existing structures to deliver a mixed use development comprising residential units (Use Class C3), flexible retail and commercial floorspace (Use Class A1/A3/B1), a Pharmacy (Use Class A1), a GP surgery (Use Class D1) and community space (Use Class D2) in buildings, provision of disabled car parking, cycle parking and servicing facilities, landscaping and other associated works.
